name: UKCloud Ltd
goal:
UKCloud's assured cloud solutions have been specifically designed to meet the needs of
the UK public sector, delivering UK sovereign services that are easy to adopt, easy to use
and easy to leave, with genuine pay by the hour consumption models. UKCloud is a
certified Public Services Network (PSN) service provider and its full range of services has
been accredited by a CESG Pan Government Accreditor (PGA). As a UK SME, UKCloud
has won a number of high-profile contracts via the G-Cloud Framework and is a key
supporter of the programme. Its services are delivered with leading technologies from the
its Alliance Partners: QinetiQ, VMware, Cisco, EMC and Ark Data Centres.
UKCloud has been named a “Cool Vendor” by analyst firm, Gartner. To learn more about
UKCloud, visit www.ukcloud.com or follow on Twitter @ukcloudltd
interests: Business and Industry, Communication, Competition, Digital economy and society, Research and innovation
euInitiatives:
European Cloud Initiative
The Data Protection Directive
Digital Single Market
